snippet.title: The Midnight Crimes | Point & Click Adventure Game | Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
DEMO: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2277870/The_Midnight_Crimes/

Submerge yourself under the skin of Benjamin Leighton, in this new story set in a dystopian British empire, in 1887, Victorian times. As a hard-boiled detective in a corrupted city that has to solve a new horrid case and face his own demons from the past along the way. Go play our DEMO already on STEAM :)
